website_summaries.verdict: Parents and toddlers are fans of this sturdy ring sling, which stows easily when not in use.
pros: Rings are sewn snugly into the sling
Folds up easily into most diaper bags
cons: Fabric is bulky and too thick for some users
Cloth can bunch up around the rings
No padding, which can make it uncomfortable at the shoulder

customer_reviews.title: Life saving!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saving must have with baby number 2! I researched for hours and this one had the best reviews for the price. I put baby girl in this sling and she is asleep within minutes every single time. She loves it and I have 2 hands to chase my toddler! Update: today my 3 year old 30lbs needed held and I'm a busy momma so into the ring sling on my hip he went and he was happy and I had two hands and he's not as heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Watch the Youtube Video's it helps a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to lie, this is very difficult to use at first. I was going to give it a 1 star and return it, instead I decided to watch Youtube video's and after a couple of tries, it worked wonderfully. Now I'm exceedingly happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: First ring sling I've purchased and I love it! Super easy and sturdy. Colors are amazing. Love it! I wanna purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am super impressed by this sling! I've tried some of the high end ring slings and found this one to be just as comfortable. There are differences though, the fabric isn't as heavy (which is nice for this crazy hot weather) so it doesn't feel as supportive of baby's weight. I also keep having issues with the fabric not fanning out well in the rings, but I'm hopeful that will improve as it softens from use. The colors are bold and pretty, overall I'm very impressed by Hip Baby!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommened!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beutiful Ring Sling and wonderful quality I am in love. I have heard nothing but amazing things about Hip Baby Wrap but haven't been able to afford the 120-160 price tag so when I saw they were officially on Amazon for cheaper I was so excited! This Ring sling is well worth the normal price of 120-160 so it is a defent steal at this price. You couldn't go wrong with this wrap I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and wear. And very comfortable! I can wear baby for hours without any discomfort. We both love it. It allows her the be close to me, and I am still able to get other things done around the house. Is especially helpful in public when she doesn't want to sit in her seat (and also keeping onlookers from invading the privacy of her seat cover) I've been using it for about 2 weeks now, baby is 1 month old, and am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Strong fabric and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It came with some pretty easy and clear instructions but this is definitely a wrap you don't wanna use for more than an hour, walking. I mainly use it in case I need a quick spare of hands to hold my daughter to clean or some sorts, but if I'm out and about walking with her, I need to make sure I'm holding her with one hand somewhat otherwise her weight will start to make the wrap start slipping.
customer_reviews.author: ZairaMelissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but still adjusting.
customer_reviews.text: Love my sling! Using it does take some practice, and my boy is used to a forward facing carrier so it's taking some time to get him used to the different position. I feel like the sling actually distributes his weight more comfortably than my "ergo" style carrier. I just wish my baby liked it more! We'll keep working on it. The fabric is beautiful and it is well made. It also comes in handy for nursing on the go. I can just lay my boy over and adjust the sling and then I can nurse and be pretty much hands free!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Cool

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use (anything that has 12 step instructions is not easy). I read the directions and watched online tutorials. I kept adjusting the sling and pouch and baby keeps sliding down past belly button and ring keeps moving over towards center of chest. Also, it limits the movement in the arm on side with shoulder strap (I cannot lift higher then my chest) and I find myself holding the baby with my other arm. I know people love ring slings and find them very useful but I just don't see the benifit. It's easier for me to just hold my baby without any sling or wrap and have use of my right arm.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Button

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This sling is so soft, I love all the extra material on the end that can be used a cover for breast-feeding or even a blanket for the baby. I wanted a carrier I could nurse in & this is so perfect! It’s exactly what I was hoping for & more. So worth the money. My daughter loves it & so do I. It was a little difficult to use at first, but if you YouTube it it definitely helps a little more than the directions. Also perfect no matter what size or shape you are it wraps right around you with a pull of the fabric
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Santos

customer_reviews.title: Most probably returning it.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many slings wraps and baby carriers before I got this one- I like it because it's easy to put on me and then put baby in, but my baby is not super comfortable in it. So, I would rate it 3.5 stars if I had the option :) For reference, my baby is 5 months old, likes to be held, but gets fidgety in this carrier after a short time. I like the color of this carrier but the fabric is not stretchy. Update- it’s not comfortable for neither the baby nor me. And hard to tighten it like I mentioned previously. And I had to change my rating due to the difficulty of use.
customer_reviews.author: NamelessinJersey

customer_reviews.title: My go-to carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to carrier at home and for errands! Not only is it simple and quick to use, but it folds up easily and fits in our diaper bag when we’re on the go. The material is strong, but also softens nicely with washing. I generally wear my daughter on my left hip (I’m right-handed) and make sure she’s in the froggy position (knees higher than her bottom) so the carrier isn’t uncomfortable against the back of her legs. I began using this when she was around 5 months, could support her own head and was beginning to sit up on her own. I love this carrier and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Morghan J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to use and easy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to use and easy. But one wash according to the label and the fabric looks muddy and dull. The colors bleed badly. My baby would lick the edge when it was near his mouth and his onesie was permanently stained with red dye. Spend the extra bucks and get a higher-end sling.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for needy babies.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when your baby just needs to be close to you at all times. I use this when I want to just walk around the house tidying up or doing whatever with my 5-month old, and don't want to take the time to truly wrap her to me. I can just throw her in here quick for a couple of minutes without much fuss to get her in it. Even better is that I can easily carry her on my hip so she can look around and see what I'm doing. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sling!! We throw it in the diaper bag & use it for grocery store trips, etc! It's great! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Iwth Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this product so far. I mainly purchased because my toddler really likes being held sometimes and she’s just too heavy. Also for when I don’t want to bring a stroller it’s a good backup that fits in the diaper bag. So far I really like it. Just like with any ring sling it takes some getting used to with regards to use but the instructions were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: WASH separately before use
customer_reviews.text: So much dye in the blue one. It ruined some of my clothes. Wash separately a couple times before using. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: KEG

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This sling just didn't work for me. I really wanted to like it. I watched all the videos on how to use it and everything, and it was just a pain. The fabric is difficult to pull through the rings. My baby hated it, I don't think she felt supported very well. I ended up using a Lillebaby carrier which she was much happier in.
customer_reviews.author: Blu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sling
customer_reviews.text: Bought before baby was born. Baby is 8 months old now. We use sling instead of stroller since strollers are difficult to maneuver in crowds and certain spaces. Love the rainbow colors. My husband doesn't even mind wearing the baby in sling. Fabric is durable. We live in Florida and have had no issues with overheating while wearing this. It can be difficult to get on and off at first, but once you get the hang of it, it is easier. I have my husband tie it off while I'm wearing baby and then pull it off to use later when I'm out alone, like a preset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A mommy must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby carrier. I wish I would have bought this one first instead I tried two others first, my daughter hated them. My daughter loves to be with me in the ring sling. ......Update message from seller says wraps and slings are all individually handmade in cooperatives under fair trade practices in India. Our business supports communities is small villages and helps provide jobs for mothers and families to be able to work out of their homes. All of our products are made with non-toxic eco-friendly dyes, locally sourced high-grade cotton and electricity-free manufacturing. All our wraps and slings are made with beautiful hand-loomed, breathable fabric. Which makes it 100 times more awesome than it already is.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrena Nyccole

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not quite
customer_reviews.text: This is convenient because it can be folded up into my diaper bag. I used it a lot the first couple months after my daughter's birth. However, i had a hard time keeping her from slouching sideways and my back would get tired. I may use it for a hip sling when she gets older.
customer_reviews.author: A. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Colorful Wrap! GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Hip Baby Wrap Ring Sling Baby Carrier works very well for long walks, in all types of warm and cool conditions and keeps the baby comfortable, cool, and secure. I wore this wrap with my 1.5 year old during the summer to various fairs, festivals, on long walks through town and city, and even when hiking! It worked extremely well in those conditions where a stroller would have been an inconvenience. It was a bit difficult to figure out and I'm still trying to perfect the back pack style of wear, but I'm VERY EXTREMELY happy with my purchase! Easily machine washable as well (hand dry).
customer_reviews.author: Kirstene

customer_reviews.title: Quality/affordability
customer_reviews.text: Ring slings can be pricey, but this one seems to blend affordability and quality. I have a boba wrap too and my youngest prefers this carrier. The material is like a structured linen with no stretch. I think he likes the support of this wrap. Colors are true to image—grey with orange. l had never used a ring sling before and watched a few videos and tried my baby for short periods in the sling before we both felt comfortable with it. It’s a nice baby carrier!
customer_reviews.author: katharine

customer_reviews.title: We use it every day
customer_reviews.text: I have this ring sling and a more backpack type baby carrier and my baby prefers this one. He won’t ride in the standard carrier, I think because it is too wide set for his legs right now. He likes being close to me in this sling and I can get things done around the house. There is a bit of a learning curve to get it on right and secure but once it is, it feels very safe. We use this every day and my baby is 2 months old, still fitting well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I have a regular carrier, and had a wrap. I loved my wrap, but once winter was over, I was not able to use it. Plus past the ‘newborn’ stage, my baby didn’t like it. I don’t feel I need the regular carrier at all times, so this sling is a great addition. Quick, easy (after quite a few tries and videos 😂), and its pretty. I used it at home during those times my baby wants to be with me, plus other quick trips. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Although this sling is made with really nice quality fabric, it isn't as comfortable as my other ring sling carrier. I prefer the Lite-on-shoulder sling which has some padding on the shoulder and is easier to pull through the rings to adjust. This sling looks cuter, but I'm all about comfort and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and comfortable for baby!
customer_reviews.text: We have a 6-month-old granddaughter that isn't happy unless you're carrying her around. And she's getting heavy! Plus, you can't do anything else because it takes both arms to hold her. I had a similar sling when I had my kids, and knew how helpful and comfortable it was for all parties. Your shoulders take more of the weight, so your arms don't get as tired. Plus, it frees up one arm at least! It doesn't take a lot of complicated wrapping, just plop her little butt into it, adjust the length and away we go! Her parents "stole" the first one I bought, so I bought another one. Very nice material, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ledvina

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell and colors bleed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the colors before I washed it and the blue bled into all of it, staining it to look muddled and dirty. The instructions state you must wash before use, and even if it didn’t, the chemical smell coming off of the sling was strong and so washing it prior to use is necessary. It still works, but the colors are not as vibrant as they were prior to washing.
customer_reviews.author: Clutterheart

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with instructions
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, and once I got the hang of it, very quick to use. It didn’t come with instructions, which was a bummer. After watching How to use a Ring Sling with a Newborn by WrappingRachel on YouTube, I was much more confident carrying baby around. I also watched one where she shows how to properly thread it, and I recommend both.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Not for very active babies
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made and comfy. I purchased this assuming my baby would love it since he loves cuddling up with us at any given moment. However, if your baby is one that doesn't like their arms restricted, this is not for you. My baby does not put up with being confined by it. He's also stronger than most babies his age so no matter how I wrap him or how secure it is, he pushes it loose with repeated movement. I ended up returning it and getting one of those buckle carriers where his arms and legs can be free instead.
customer_reviews.author: brightside89

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay set for very long
customer_reviews.text: It's a great concept, but I found through practice that the cloth doesn't stay fastened very long in the buckle/ ring. I frequently have to tighten it and end up supporting my daughter on my hip with my arm anyway, which kind of defeats the purpose. My mother-in-law is from Nigeria, Africa, and suggested I use it to carry my daughter on my back instead... I don't trust the rings enough to do that since I struggle enough with her in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Asia

customer_reviews.title: It looks very pretty and the fabric is strong and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It looks very pretty and the fabric is strong and comfortable. The fabric is not thick so it breathes and baby doesn't get sweaty right away. But it is hard to actually use. If not done correctly baby will keep shifting or slide down. Is not practical for a long walk or fast movements. I wish it came with instructions or link to a video. A few people made youtube videos but everyone does it different.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Colors bleed
customer_reviews.text: I put three stars. I ordered this back in November 2018 for my baby due March 2019. I’m planning on using it for the first time tonight (baby is 4 weeks). I washed it last night in cold water, and it bled like crazy. I’m really disappointed in that. Other than that, I’m sure it will be fine. Just don’t like how it bled. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, good for short uses
customer_reviews.text: I have two under the age of two and this is a must! It seems somebody always wants to be held and this keeps my arms from giving out while it isn’t the most comfortable a carriers (I have the wrap and an ergo) it is definitely the easiest to use and adjust for my toddler and infant. You can’t lift the shoulder the carrier is wrapped over very high so it’s not the best for doing chores in. It is also fairly compact so it fits nicely in my purse. It’s my go to for quick carries.
customer_reviews.author: P. Belnap

customer_reviews.title: So easy to adjust!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I've used a scarf tied tightly with my first two, but THIS is a game changer. Super easy to adjust and soft and strong. I feel confidant baby will love this thing while it's too little for my tula :) Right now I am 8 months pregnant and my two year old is loving having more mommy up time cause I can put him in this while I make breakfast ♡
customer_reviews.author: Ash Gundelach

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: I've never been huge on baby wearing but I fly with my daughter periodically so I need some kind of carrier to keep my hands free. I like the simplicity of the ring sling but I couldn't justify spending $90 on a piece of fabric with a metal ring, I just didn't get it. Amazon to the rescue! I found this sling and love it. The color is cute, it washes well, and it's comfortable for me and baby girl. I don't use it super often, but I like not dealing with clips, zippers, buckles, and other mechanisms. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea W.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy the honeycomb one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item (the honeycomb one) in late June. I used it for a while and watched multiple YouTube videos on how to properly use it. My problem is... the honeycomb texture prevents proper usage! You can’t adequately get the rails to sit flat and therefore there is always slippage. The texture is uncomfortable on the skin and i stopped using it after 2 months of trying to get used to it. But a flat textured one, I haven’t used them but I am sure they work a hell of a lot better than this honeycomb one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel & Jessi

customer_reviews.title: It’s a very pretty sling, but I am not a fan of ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very pretty sling , but I am not a fan of it . It is very hard stiff fabric , I’ve washed it a few times to get it softer and can’t . I have another ring sling I use a lot it’s so much softer. I also wish it was longer , it doesn’t work great for plus size moms .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice budget sling
customer_reviews.text: It's very soft out of the package and I think the picture accurately shows the colors. It takes some practice to use and that's why I like my structured carriers a bit better. Overall I'd say the product is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I used a wrap type carrier for my son and did not like how I had to do so much wrapping around before I could put him in it. I got this for my baby girl and it is very easy to use and can put it on and take it off very quickly! I am in love and so is she. It came with directions and it was helpful as were some YouTube videos that visually showed me how to use it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no-tech baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: For my wife and I, this is a perfect baby carrier -- simple, portable (it's the size and weight of a large scarf), adjustable (I am a 260-lb man, she a 110-lb woman), inexpensive, attractive, and absolutely no bells or whistles. It allows you use of your hands, and also allows you to interact with the baby while carrying him/her while also letting the baby see what's going on.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Quick to put on and great for shorter wear times
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this sling but decided to go for it and really glad I did. The sling is much faster to put on than my cuddle bug wrap and great for a quick trip into the store or situations wear I might be sitting mostly. I don’t recommend for long wear because you are carrying the weight on one shoulder. Although the design does a great job of dispersing little ones weight if you follow the directions. I also love having the extra material to hold over lo’s head in sunny or rainy weather. The directions could be a little easier to follow but once you put it on they will make sense.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley O

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had to learn how to use a ring sling. After the learning curve the baby is now 3 months old and happy that I can effectively wrap her up without the beginning struggles of "how do I do this thing?" I'm glad I was persistent. I love the fabric and the baby is comfortable inside. The summer was super hot and the fabric breathed. Now it is chilly and I'm grateful that the fabric is thicker than most. Although there is weight to the fabric, it glides through the loop with ease, making adjustments easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it. My baby is 6 weeks, I've had it since she was 4 weeks. Took several videos to figure out how to properly thread it and put baby in. I deducted one star because the fabric in the rings bunches up no matter what I do. I've tried 5 diff methods of keeping it straightened out and not bunched and nmw i do It bunches again. I think its bc of the fabric type. It's not a huge deal but it def makes it harder to tighten the sling.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Church

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sling. It takes a little to adjust each time but so easy to skip on quick and easy to nurse while baby is in it. I like it so much more than my boba wrap, my newborn feels secure and I don’t have millions of layers of wrap on me. Works great in warmer weather or to slip on to carry my newborn while helping my toddler with things
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The wrap is way more simple to use than the ones you need to wrap all around your body, you can just throw it over your shoulder, pop the baby in and tighten it, no complicated steps. The wrap itself is made of nice thick material and it feels like it holds the baby's weight securely. My little one seemed comfortable and fell asleep in it pretty quickly. It was also easy to get the baby out of the wrap, meaning she didn't wake up all the way when I took her out to transfer her to her crib. As a bonus the wrap looks nice when you wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wash it first!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy this is to use and it’s very lightweight. BUT make sure you wash it a couple times before using it. I opened the package and immediate tried it out. I had it on for about an hour and was then covered in hives and an itchy rash. I don’t know what it’s treated with, but my reaction was pretty severe. After washing and drying, the material is VERY bunched and doesn’t lay nearly as well as I’d hope. It will probably need to be ironed or steamed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands free snuggling time for the multitasking momma
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier! It's the best way to get hands free snuggle time. It's cute and fashionable. There are so many uses for this sling: baby carrier, nursing cover, blanket, carseat cover to protect from cold or bright sun..ect. The fabric is quality. The design seems firm. Watch YouTube videos to maximize your use of this sling.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable backup for baby wearing
customer_reviews.text: This sling is nice to keep in the small diaper bag I take into stores because I can quickly put my lo in if he gets fussy. However, it is not great for wearing for extended periods of time since the lo’s weight is not distributed across my body. Until my lo could consistently hold his own head, I kept one arm around him while he was in this sling. So, it helped me hold him, but didn’t give me the ability to use both my hands as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sling. Well made. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This sling is GORGEOUS. So beautiful. Rings are solid, tons of fabric at the shoulder that’s reinforced. Needs a bit of breaking in but I’m really happy with it. I bought the summer rainbow color for $49.95, great price for good quality. It’s comparable in size and feel to WildBird.co and some others. Very happy with this sling. Learn how to wrap a ring sling properly! Once you have the technique, it’s cake.
customer_reviews.author: Caitielin34

customer_reviews.title: Bought for our elderly 21 lb dog
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something compact and lightweight, to use for our aging dog. We went for a long hike this weekend and thankfully had this wrap with us. Poor guy got tired near the end. He didn't fuss and seemed to enjoy being carried in the wrap. Several passing hikers commented on how cute it was. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is perfect. The material is soft and breathable. The colors are really vivid and pretty. I am 5ft 10in and it fits with room to spare for my 9lb LO so I am hoping we will be able to work for is for a long while to come. Couldn't be happier. I used a K'tan for my first one, but this is one is so much easier to put on, particularly if the LI is already asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, looks expensive. I got the Kiwi color. Slightly darker than pictured but still a great neural. Rings are a brushed metal. Material is also a little thicker than expected but I still love it. Just as good as other brands that sell for $100+. Only complaint is fabric is kind of thick and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Little Opal

customer_reviews.title: Great until washed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sling until I washed it. I followed the care instructions but after being washed it wouldn’t hold tight—the fabric slipped way too easily through the loops. My baby was never secure and it made me anxious to put him in it. I’m really bummed because prior to being washed it was my favorite way to carry him.
customer_reviews.author: Amwenze

customer_reviews.title: Saves my poor arms!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sling. It's comfortable for both my daughter and myself. I haven't worn her for more than an hour, but both of us are still happy at the end of an hour. If you watch some instructional videos on youtube before hand it makes using it the first time way easier. The sling is pretty comfortable on my shoulder for the most part. It does come loose after awhile, but that might just be because I haven't quite mastered using it yet. My daughter is 7 months old and about 19lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Samus Aran

customer_reviews.title: Love! Can't live with out! Pricey though
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! My newborn loves this. He enjoys being Carried around the house with me and this allowed me to have two hands. Very easy to use. My only complaint is that it's pretty expensive for it being two rings and a piece of fabric. It is totally worth the comfort for both me and my baby though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The rainbow colors are bright and beautiful, even after machine washing (hang dry). This sling is so easy to toss in the bottom of the stroller, in the car, or in the diaper bag. We use it all the time. I am very particular with fabrics because I have sensitive skin but this sling is soft and gentle on me and baby. I definitely plan to buy more and to get them for people as gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Les P

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for :(
customer_reviews.text: Bleeds like stink! DO NOT WASH with any other clothes! I blame myself because I read this in the reviews and did it anyways... definitely ruined several expensive items! Also after one wash the fabric changes for the worst. Disappointed in this product to be honest. Just spend the extra money and get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Stenyakina

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap and so does my baby, I also find it convenient. I nurse her too when in the wrap. I have gotten compliments too. That it look cute and that such a great way to bond with baby
customer_reviews.author: aleb90

customer_reviews.title: Came as advertised- personally just not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have an ergobaby & moby wrap. Personally just prefer both of them over the ring sling. Nothing wrong with this particular product- came just as advertised. Would definitely wash before using, fabric is a little rough feeling & a bit smelly. Overall held baby in. Just wasn't very secure feeling to me, always felt like I needed a hand on her while using it which defeats the hands free purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S.

customer_reviews.title: Best ring loop sling on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the breathability for my son during the sumemr time. It is also largely adjustable so both me and my wife can wear it and all the adjustment needed is a simple tug at the 2 rings. I've dealt with the wraps and harnesses but the freedom and ability to repossesion our baby is what makes the Sling the best. Mulitple different positons can be used with a smaller baby against your chest or as they start getting older being able to sit them on your hip and have the sling support there back and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Austin K

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sling.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sling. I had a similar one about 15 years ago. Lost in a box in one of our moves. I have a brain damaged cat who loves to be held. The sling allows me to cuddle him without taxing my arms. He is 7lbs. You would do even better with a human child.
customer_reviews.author: TAHK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design made really well
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design made really well. Takes some getting used to when trying to adjust it. Unfortunately my baby did not want to be so confined after about 2 months we stopped using it. But the product itself is great
customer_reviews.author: Tara marie

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and so well made. I would have totally bought more if they where a little cheaper, but for the quality and the over use I've given it, the price was totally worth it. I loved it and after an emergency c section this was the perfect and mostly used item from my whole registry. I take it everywhere. The only thing negative is when I forget it at home and I'm out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Great for small babies
customer_reviews.text: Once I YouTubed how to use this, it was easy and secure. My baby loved being close to me and would fall asleep while I could get things done. It was great while my baby was very young, but once he hit 10 lbs, it put a lot of pressure on my shoulder, making my shoulder sore the next day.
customer_reviews.author: kristamd

customer_reviews.title: Okay product.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to LOVE it since I heard amazing reviews on slings similar to this one. It could be that my baby is still too small but my 3 month old slips out of the sling. The sling isn’t sturdy enough to hold the sitting position so any little movement or wiggle and the baby starts slipping out.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great ring sling and very helpful !
customer_reviews.text: Before i found this baby ring sling, I used a baby backpack to carry my baby around, mostly at home when I have to get things done. After 15 min my whole back hurted because it pulled everything towards the front. Since 3 days we are using this baby sling now and let me tell you, it's so much better and I have zero backpain. You have your hands free and get things done easily. Even my husband was already wearing it. I can definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: This ring sling is the best I've found
customer_reviews.text: This ring sling is the best I've found, especially for the price. I tried so many slings and wraps when my baby was a newborn. He was only 6 lbs, so finding one that he could fit in was difficult; most of the "pre-formed" slings only allow you to adjust the length of the back/shoulder strap, not the actual size of the area that the baby lays in. This one had the best fabric, and was the easiest to use and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse W.

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bobo
customer_reviews.text: So happy I pulled the trigger on this sling. I use it everyday. Perfect for newborns and nursing. Frees up my hands for my toddler. Wish they offered more neutral solid fabric options. I was not into the stripes or prints. So, I got the solid royal blue with a small baby blue pin stripe accent. I love the fabric and color did not fade with washing. I never use my bobo wrap anymore because it is such a pain to put on and adjust. Hip baby ring sling is a breeze in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Beach House Wife

customer_reviews.title: My favorite carrier!
customer_reviews.text: I had another ring sling that I've used religiously since my baby was newborn, but it's been getting stretched out and I constantly have to readjust it. This fabric is insanely comfortable and the waffle texture helps it stay put! My new favorite carrier for sure! It also doesn't bunch up in the rings like my old one does either, making it much easier to adjust with baby in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this sling
customer_reviews.text: I love this sling! Why spend over $100 for a good sling? This one is absolutely gorgeous, works for any gender (plus I'm a firm believer in buying baby gear I like for ME, not gender specific so I can use it for any baby) it is sturdy, and with a swift tuck in of my sons legs, I can lay him sideways and subtly nurse him! It's one of my best baby purchases. I wish I would've had it when my daughter was smaller! She's 2 and would kill my back if I tried 😅
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on and not soft or comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I COULD NOT figure out how to get this thing on the right way so it would be comfortable for my baby and I! I watched Youtube videos and still couldn’t get it on right. Hurt my neck and my baby hated it. The material is not soft either.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly sling
customer_reviews.text: I love my carrier for when I’m out with my son, but I wanted something more relaxed and cozy for when he’s needing to be close and I need my hands at home. I watched a couple videos to see how to put it on when it came, but it really just takes practice putting it on. I get better every time, and my baby is happy and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Jobe

customer_reviews.title: Dye runs.
customer_reviews.text: Got the Fern color sling. I decided to wash it before use. The instructions say to hand wash so I did. The dye ran. I am currently in the process of using Retayne to fix the dye. Glad I didn’t run it through the washer with other clothes. It’s a pain to go through this extra process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality - So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 Month old who is going through some major separation anxiety. I like my regular carrier but having my son right in front of me makes it hard to do anything. So I wanted something I could hip carry with. This sling is so well made and easy to use. I can now comfortably and easily carry my 24lb 9 month old son all day without killing my arms or back. I really honestly wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the ring sling. Easy to take my 2 yo in and out of. Frees my hands, no stroller. I tried to buy rings and "make" my own, but I wasn't about to ruin an excellent woven Moby for a sling. So I bought this instead. Again, my LO is 2 years, 25 lbs and 33in. I am 5'2. Cannot rave about the ring slings enough. GET ONE FOR YOURSELF!!!!! Even my hubby has worn the baby using this sling. <3 <3
customer_reviews.author: Dre1329

customer_reviews.title: Great sling
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I am still getting the hang of wearing a ring sling but can tell it’ll be super helpful. I was nervous because this sling is a lot cheaper than most but it seems to work well. The material is a little stiff but it seems that it’ll loosen up once used.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Love this sling!
customer_reviews.text: I love my sling so much! It’s so easy to use and the baby loves being in it. It's a lot faster to on when I'm out than a wrap sling. I'm excited to use it as my baby gets older too. Oh! Just FYI, make sure to was it separately. Mine bled and turned some of my cute white clothes pink. Kind of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great ring sling for training
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap ring sling to try and practice on for my first one. Love this one. The color stripes help to see where to pull to tighten. Holds well and comfortably. I would consider investIng in a quality fabric for the next one - thicker with some give, but this one has been great
customer_reviews.author: J. Bolinger

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this sling. I'm a single mom of an almost one month old baby boy and this thing is a life saver! It was simple to fit and adjust, and it is very easy to get him in and out of! I think this will be my best friend for the next year to come!
customer_reviews.author: Arynn Smock

customer_reviews.title: Ring slinging momma!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many ring slings and love this one for two reasons- it is very ez to put on and the baby feels extremely secure, and second it is fashionable. I get lots of compliments and wear it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davies

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality ring sling
customer_reviews.text: Lovely ring sling for the price. The fabric was great, soft and quite pretty, and not too easily wrinkled. This one comes with metal rings not plastic for those looking for a sling for airports. Overall impressive quality, good stitching, and works well. Unfortunately a sling didn't end up being what we needed, otherwise this would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMv

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. It is so pretty, and the fabric feels nice. However, it is nearly impossible to position correctly. My 2 month old wants to be held nonstop. By the time I get her in this wrap and positioned correctly, she is so frustrated and can’t be settled. I have other wraps that work great, I just bought this as a splurge because I thought it was so pretty. I just end up using my other ones bc it’s not worth the struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this sling! I wouldn't get much done around the house with my newborn without it! Good quality fabric and sturdy rings. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kjelland

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This sling is completely amazing! It is a super soft, high quality fabric, very comfortable and easy to adjust, while still being safe and sturdy for my baby girl. She is 4 months, weighs 14 pounds and fits beautifully in the sling. I know it will also adjust to fit her as she grows, so I will be sure to use it for a long time. My mom, who watches her while I’m at work, also uses it regularly and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Drumm

customer_reviews.title: This woven wrap works very well and is beautiful. I had many compliments on the rainbow print ...
customer_reviews.text: This woven wrap works very well and is beautiful. I had many compliments on the rainbow print and was always comfortable while wearing baby in this sling. When she was 2 months old I was walking in to Whole Foods and slipped and fell on the wet floor while wearing her in this. I fell hard and fast and landed squarely on my kneecap. I broke my patella but my tiny newborn baby stayed secure and was completely unharmed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kole

customer_reviews.title: Great price and very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Great price/quality. When our LO was a newborn this was the only sling she could safely fit in! At 2.5 months she still likes it. I enjoy that its fully adjustable so other family members can use the same sling.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great ring sling
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ring sling, I originally bought it as a back up to keep in my car & have a fall color carrier. In comparison to the sakra bloom ring sling this one is wider, has the same quality linen, and is a fraction of the price. I have both and use both, but really prefer the width of the hip baby sling.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Very cute sling, but the washing instructions online are misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sling (it’s like other ring slings I have that were much more expensive). The pros: it’s cute, great colors, easy to use, sturdy. The cons: it’s says machine wash/dry in the amazon details, but on the sling itself it say hang dry if you don’t want the fabric to shrink. Also, the dye bleed like crazy! So, be careful hang-drying it. Personally, I hesitated to wash it in my machine. So, I hand-washed it in cold water and I’m glad I did. So much fabric dye gets everywhere. All-in-all, I would order it again, and will probably order other colors
customer_reviews.author: hannah france

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wraps
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this wrap! I was looking for a ring sling to take on vacation and this was perfect! Fellow moms in my local babywearing group were impressed with this wrap! (Just make sure you do as the instructions say and wash it separately unless you want colorful clothes!) This is my second purchase from Hip Baby Wrap and I am sure it won’t be my last!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I love this ring sling
customer_reviews.text: I love this ring sling. I’m not a huge baby wearing guru but this is comfy and easy to use. A lot cozier for around the house then a soft structured carrier but just as easy to use. I’ve recomended it to many friends. My only complaint is the first time I washed it the colors bled, but it was my fault for not washing it by itself and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Great wrap! Use it for my 4 month old AND my two year old . only wrap thats so versatile 💜
customer_reviews.author: candygirl

customer_reviews.title: Love baby slings
customer_reviews.text: Love baby slings! This one is pretty good but doesn't adjust easily once you have it tight. It's like the fabric is too textured to slide easily through the rings. Good quality though for sure! This one is actually a blue/white textured fabric. Thought it was going to b black/white 🙁
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Kelleher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I hate the price point on this, but it's pretty amazing. I am able to hold my toddler who weights 25lbs without feeling like I'm dying. I have back issues from that pregnancy and have tried so many carriers. This help allot, but it isn't perfect I still experience back pain after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Katsme-ow

customer_reviews.title: Happy I found this when I did
customer_reviews.text: Currently pregnant with my second baby and have a one year old that hates his stroller. A recent flight prompted me to find this sling to help carry my little one in the airport with ease. Have only used it for hip carry with a toddler, but its a big help. Gives my arms a little bit of a break. It can take some finesse to get it in just the right position, but not to much of a struggle. Happy I found this when I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for me and baby. My husband even likes to wear baby with this wrap. Just be careful when washing because the color does bleed onto clothing during 1st wash but doesn’t make the color fade.
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great ring sling!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this ring sling!!! It is beautiful and it works awesome. My baby loves to be in it and it is super comfortable for me. I was worried that it would hurt my back or feel like all the weight was on one shoulder, but this isn’t an issue at all. Also, this company is certified by the Baby Carrier Industry Alliance, so you know it’s safe!! :)
customer_reviews.author: lerato

customer_reviews.title: Great for nursing!
customer_reviews.text: Looooove my sling! Right now, my baby is only 12 lbs and the sling doesn't hurt at all. I do worry about when she weighs more but for now, it doesn't strain my back or shoulders. I'd always been a huge fan of my Ergo carrier but you can't nurse or bottle feed in it. So I mainly ordered the ring sling so I could nurse her in it. Works great! The fabric is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: DWiley

customer_reviews.title: Rough material
customer_reviews.text: First off, I was sent the wrong color and do not really like the color I received. Secondly, the material is incredibly stiff and strange feeling. I’m not new to the waffle material but this one just feels way to rough for my little babes sensitive skin. Not sure if I got a bad one or what but I wish it were more soft. It’s very difficult to pull the material through the rings because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received this sling with hopes it would be a good one for my second baby. I was so pleasantly surprised. Some have commented that it doesn’t have padding around the shoulder, but I find it very comfortable and there seems to be plenty of fabric to keep it from digging in. I love that it’s all cotton and easily washable. The fabric and rings feel sturdy too! What a great price and product!
customer_reviews.author: NC

product_meta.title: Hip Baby Wrap Ring Sling Baby Carrier for Infants and Toddlers (Rainbow Honeycomb)
product_meta.description: Color:Rainbow HoneycombFeaturing a colorful print and a simple design, our sling provides an elegant and traditional way to carry little ones. Promotes bonding and physical development as Baby grows. Our soft cotton construction are uniquely hand-woven to provide a bit of give so they mold perfectly to the body and create a very comfortable fit for Baby and Babywearer.
feature_bullets: Easily adjustable to be used for front tummy to tummy and hip carries for infants through toddlers.
Made with beautiful 100% cotton, hand-loomed, breathable fabric and with top quality aluminum SlingRings. For babies 8 – 35 lbs.

Our lightweight fabric makes the Hip Baby Wrap cooler for baby and easy to manipulate. Superior ergonomic design helps distribute baby's weight evenly and comfortably across caregiver's body, relieving the shoulders and neck from unnecessary strain. Great for nursing on-the-go and as a nursing cover. Enhances parent-child bonding and child development.
Our slings are all fair trade and individually handwoven with eco-friendly non- toxic dyes in India so each wrap is beautiful and unique.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,100 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
